original: Claeson, Hans Ragnar, major, Borås, f. 17/7/85 i Ulricehamn av rådm. Carl August C. o, Alma Rydin. G. 15 m. Anna Sprakarn. Barn: Ella f. 16, Anna 17, Claes-Arvid 19. — Stud:-ex. i Skara 03, off :ex. 05. Und :löjtn. i Älvsb. reig. 05, löjtn. 08, kapt. i reg. 20, major i armén 35, i Älvsb. reg. res. sed. 35. Verkst. dir. i A-B Borås Tidn. sed. 39. Led. av ’stadsfulilm. ised. 30, drätselkamm. ;sed. 29, v. ordf. 35, ordf. i styr. f. A-B Bostäder o. A-B Barnbostäder, v. ordf. i S’tyr. f. Borås’ Sparbank. RSO, RVO.
translated: Claeson, Hans Ragnar, Major, Borås. Born on July 17, 1885 in Ulricehamn to the councillor Carl August C. and Alma Rydin. Married to Anna Sprakarn in 19xx, and they have three children: Ella, born in 1916, Anna born in 1917, and Claes-Arvid born in 1919. He passed his studentexamen in Skara in 1903 and his officersexamen in 1905. He was second lieutenant in Älvsborg regiment in 1905, promoted to lieutenant in 1908, captain in the regiment in 1920, and major in the Army in 1935. He remained in the reserve of the Älvsborg regiment starting in 1935. He was appointed managing director at A-B Borås Tidning in 1939. Claeson was a member of the City Council since 1930, of the Budget Committee since 1929, vice chairman of the Budget Committee since 1935, and chairman of the board for A-B Bostäder and A-B Barnbostäder. He also served as vice chairman of the Board for Borås Savings Bank. Claeson was awarded Riddare av Svärdsorden (RSO) and Riddare av Vasaorden (RVO).
